mapper.select: select partner_store.sname sname, partner_store_menu.* from partner_store inner join partner_store_menu on partner_store.sno = partner_store_menu.sno where partner_store_menu.status = 'O' and partner_store_menu.sno = #{sno}
select sno from partner partner left outer join partner_store store on partner.pno = store.pno where pid=#{pid}
mapper.update: update partner_store_menu set max_quantity=#{max_quantity} where sno= #{sno} and mno= #{mno};
